title: Flat Earth - A movie by Bataleon Snowboards
description: Bataleon presents Flat Earth, our first-ever team movie, filmed in three diverse locations—Japan, Norway, and the Alps. This film highlights our team’s spirit, giving each rider the chance to showcase their unique style and what they bring to the crew. With a strong lineup of Bataleon riders, Flat Earth emphasizes the shared experience and bond that make our team special. Smile, it’s snowboarding

title: You Are Inside Your Heart | VANS
description:
You Are Inside Your Heart is a video portrait of Benny Urban. Benny has been out shooting for this film alongside the Vans Snow Team across Europe during the last two and a half years.
Shot on location in Norway, Finland, Austria, Slovakia, and Germany.
For this film we united with director Alexander Tank who’s one of Benny’s best childhood friends who was a former Snowboard Pro himself and is now a successful movie director.
Benny: It’s been such an incredible opportunity to have had so much creative freedom on creating a film with Vans. It’s probably been the craziest two years of my life since our daughter was born right in the middle of the project. It’s the best thing that has ever happened to me and throughout this whole filming process, I was learning so much about fatherhood and simultaneously trying to power through with this project and continuing my life as a professional snowboarder.
The film is starring: Antti Jussila, Nils Arvidsson, Sebi Springeth, Dominik Wagner, Simon Gschaider, Jake Kuzyk, Jill Perkins, Benny Urban. Filmed by: Alex Pfeffer, Harry Hagan, Anton Kiiski, Peter Mader, Aleksi Kemiläinen, Jukka Metsäaho, Mikael Ahtikari, Robin Pailler. Directed and edited by: Alexander Tank. Music in order: "No Excuse" by Stalag 13, "Mom’s Birthday" by Max High, "Kontrole" by De Brassers, "Moon 11" by Moon B, "Eyes won’t let me open" by Stennes, "Castles" by Richard Vain.
